summary: Bela Kiss was one of the the most brutal serial killers, who killed 23 young women during the beginning of the first World War. The blood-drained bodies were found in metal barrels, conserved in alcohol.
cast: Andreas Wisniewski|Steven Weber|Joachim Günthner|Thomas Bangert|Jörg Koslowsky|Kristina Klebe|Fabian Stumm|Ben Bela Böhm|Janina Elkin|Angus McGruther|Jürgen Förstner|Roman Shamov|Cameron Begg|Collien Ulmen-Fernandes|Julia Horvath|Justin Kuhl|Peer Martiny|Rudolf Martin|Claudia Jäger|Jennifer Jacob|Denis Fischer|Gilles Förstner|Michael Heinkel|Ekaterina August|Sylvia Günthner|Thomas Fischer|Rufina Neumann|Falk Tröber|Julia Buschmann|Marie Mayer|Lucien Förstner|Frances Devine|Ed Gaietto|Sabrina Windisch|Andreas Dürr|Artur Sorokin|Boris Batchvarov|Claudia Endriss|Gisa Gaietto|Eberhard Goll|Jürgen Müller|Oliver Müller
title: Bela Kiss: Prologue
